attribute.description: The GET path of page to navigate, WITHOUT leading slash and extension.
attribute.name: path

attribute.description: The value of the link. Defaults to page title.
attribute.name: value

tag.description: Renders a a form which always submits to exact request URI.

attribute.description: The ID of the form.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Whether the form represents a fieldset. Defaults to true.
attribute.name: fieldset

attribute.description: Whether the form is stateless. Defaults to whether user is not logged in. Note that setting to true affects the entire view.
attribute.name: stateless

attribute.description: The ID of the input field, this usually represents the property name. This is set as ID the <input> element itself and used as general key for label. The <div> element representing the whole field will get the same ID suffixed with "_f". The <label> element representing the label will get the same ID suffixed with "_l". The <ul> element representing the message list will get the same ID suffixed with "_m". The PrimeFaces widgetVar value will be the same ID suffixed with "_w". There are seven named inserts which you can define via ui:define: beforeLabel, label, insideLabel, beforeInput, input, beforeMessages and messages. The default insert ends up inside input.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Whether to render HTML output or not. Defaults to true. Under the covers, this actually uses <c:if> instead of rendered, so it should save unnecessary bean initialization.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: The style class of the field. This is applied on the <div> element representing the whole field.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: The style class of the label of the field. This is applied on the <label> element representing the label.
attribute.name: labelStyleClass

attribute.description: The style class of the input field itself. This is applied on the <input> element itself.
attribute.name: inputStyleClass

attribute.description: The style class of the message list of the field. This is applied on the <ul> element representing the message list.
attribute.name: messagesStyleClass

attribute.description: The label of the field. Defaults to #{i18n['general.' += id]}.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: The tooltip of the label of the field.
attribute.name: tooltip

attribute.description: The type of the input field. Special types are a.o. 'menu', 'checkbox', 'number', 'autocomplete', 'password' and 'custom'. Other types are interpreted as HTML5 input type. Defaults to 'text'.
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: The value of the input field.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Whether the input field is required. Defaults to false. Only use this setting for conditionally required fields or checkboxes; normally @NotNull must be used.
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: Whether the input field supports client side autocomplete. Defaults to true.
attribute.name: autocomplete

attribute.description: The maximum length of the input field. This must be a positive number. Defaults to 255.
attribute.name: maxlength

attribute.description: The p:autoComplete method in case type attribute is set to 'autocomplete'.
attribute.name: completeMethod

attribute.description: Whether to HTML-escape the message list. Defaults to true.
attribute.name: escapeMessages

tag.description: Renders a field for buttons. This must be placed in k:form fieldset=true.
Renders a button which can act as either navigation button or submit button. This must be placed in k:buttons.

attribute.description: The ID of the submit button.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: The value of the button. Defaults to #{i18n['general.' += id]}.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: The GET path of page to navigate, WITHOUT leading slash and extension.
attribute.name: path

attribute.description: The POST action method of the button. This is ignored when 'path' attribute is specified.
attribute.name: action

attribute.description: Whether or not to use ajax. Defaults to true. Applies only when 'action' is specified.
attribute.name: ajax

tag.description: Renders a table based on PagedDataModel. Each item is available by #{item}.

attribute.description: The ID of the table.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Data model must be an instance of PagedDataModel.
attribute.name: value

tag.description: Renders a table column for a specific field. By default nowrap/ellipsis.

attribute.description: The field (property) name of the #{item} representing the column value. By default, this is also used in id, field, sortBy and filterBy of p:column.
attribute.name: field
